dcterms:creator: John F Banzhaf III
dcterms:description: A mathematical analysis of weighted voting systems, demonstrating that they do not function as intended due to the non-proportional influence of players.
dcterms:title: Banzhaf indices

dcterms:creator: Lloyd S Shapley
dcterms:description: A foundational work introducing the Shapley value, a method for fairly distributing payoffs among players in cooperative games based on their contributions.
dcterms:title: Shapley values

dcterms:creator: Robert James Weber
dcterms:description: A technical report discussing the subjectivity involved in the valuation of games, introducing the concept of semivalues as a generalization of power indices.
dcterms:title: Semivalues

dcterms:creator: Ryan Oâ€™Donnell
Rocco A Servedio
dcterms:description: An exploration of the Chow parameters problem, which involves reconstructing a weights-based representation of linear threshold functions from their Chow parameters.
dcterms:title: Chow parameters

dcterms:creator: Anindya De
Ilias Diakonikolas
Rocco A Servedio
dcterms:description: A study addressing the inverse Shapley value problem, focusing on designing weighted voting games that achieve specified target Shapley values.
dcterms:title: Inverse Shapley value problem

dcterms:creator: Sascha Kurz
dcterms:description: An investigation into the inverse power index problem, specifically focusing on the Banzhaf index and its computational challenges.
dcterms:title: Inverse Banzhaf index problem

dcterms:creator: Xiaotie Deng
Christos H Papadimitriou
dcterms:description: A study on the complexity of cooperative solution concepts, including the #Partition and #R-Partition problems, which are related to the computational aspects of voting games.
dcterms:title: #Partition problem

dcterms:creator: Xiaotie Deng
Christos H Papadimitriou
dcterms:description: A study on the complexity of cooperative solution concepts, including the #Partition and #R-Partition problems, which are related to the computational aspects of voting games.
dcterms:title: #R-Partition problem
